Golf Memberships
Flexible Memberships to Fit Your Life
If a Ron Garl championship golf course meandering through an unspoiled setting of century old oak trees, soaring pines and native wetlands appeals to you, then you owe it to yourself and your family to become a Member of Bloomingdale Golfers Club.
Membership at Bloomingdale is surprisingly affordable and is the Tampa Bay area’s best value for golf.
As a Member of Bloomingdale Golfers Club, you will enjoy unlimited championship golf with 14-day advance tee times, tour-quality practice facilities and more. Bloomingdale offers a variety of memberships including Single, Couple, Family, Senior (55+), Intermediate (19-34), and Juniors (18 and under).
Bloomingdale Golf Members enjoy reciprocal privileges at Florida Golf Trail® daily fee/semi-private clubs as well as playing privileges at the exclusive Bayou Club.
Like to walk when you play?
Walking is allowed for Members everyday before 8:00am and after 3:00pm.
For more information on Membership opportunities at Bloomingdale Golfers Club, stop by the Golf Shop or call
813-685-4105

Book a Tee Time
Special Events & Meetings
A Great Clubhouse and Scenic Course Views Provide The Perfect Backdrop for Your Event
Bloomingdale Golfers Club offers two venues for all of your meeting and special event needs. Choose from our all-inclusive packages or have our Event Specialist create a custom menu just for you.
The Pizzeria & Grille ~ up to 100 guests
Bloomingdale’s friendly and professional staff combined with the casual atmosphere of our Clubhouse make the Pizzeria & Grille the perfect choice for your meeting or event. Bloomingdale offers affordable event packages and personalized menus for any size budget.
The Lee Janzen Room ~ up to 25 guests
Two-time U.S. Open Champion and PGA TOUR Professional Lee Janzen was so impressed with our private meeting room, he lent his name to it!
If you are looking for a intimate conference room for your company, group, or organization’s next meeting, the Lee Janzen Room at Bloomingdale Golfers Club will make you feel like a champion. The professional golfer has thrilled thousands of golf fans with his stellar play, and you’ll be thrilled too when you reserve your next meeting in the room that bears his name. High speed wireless Internet is available.
For information on hosting your next event at Bloomingdale, please call
(813) 685-4105
.
